EmailTemplate.name: Oct29Webinar-SourcingTalent.Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending - Resources from our Talent Sourcing webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for attending MBO's webinar titled "Sourcing Talent for 2013 and Beyond: Whose Job is it, Anyway?" held on Tuesday, October 29. Jay Lash, VP of Market Strategies, joined two talent acquisition specialists to discuss their perspective on talent sourcing and expert recruiting techniques. Below you will find links related to the presentation: Webinar Recording <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/pu1PgfkY-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar Slide Deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Slides%20from%20Our%20Webinar%20on%20Sourcing%20Talent%20for%202013%20and%20Beyond.pdf> <http://sig.org/webinars.php> State of Independence Report <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/independent-workforce-index.html> Post-Webinar Survey <http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/WJFYMPY>
